_sText:
DEATHRUN_TRIBUTE by Target Practice

- This is a deathrun map, with a twist.
- Features 18 traps, at least 9 of which have never been seen before in deathrun.
- After 4-minutes, players will be teleported to a volleyball room.
- There are 4 random rewards when completing the map.
- Give the bird a hug.

_________________________________________________

THIS MAP IS SPONSORED BY

Husky Gaming
www.huskygaming.com
DrivenByFear

_________________________________________________

VOLLEYBALL ROOM
...If those pesky CTs just don't die then settle the round with a friendly match of volleyball. 
...After four minutes, all living players will be teleported to the volleyball room.
...The team who reaches 2 points first, falls to a gruesome death.
...Terrorists have the advantage here due to their speed and duel pistols.

RANDOM REWARDS
...If you are lucky or skilled enough to complete this map, then you will not be dissappointed.
...This map incorporates a special win-system whereby upon completion you will be teleported to a random reward.
...These rewards are chosen randomly (duh?), and will greatly alter your gaming experience.

Random Reward 1: The laser room.

As a terrorist you must dodge the lasers and knife those CTs before they shoot you!

Random Reward 2: Shotgun justice.

Get shotgun. Kill Ts. Job done. End of.

Random Reward 3: P90 mayhem.

P90 + lots of ammo. You know the drill.

Random Reward 4: Breakfloor (My personal favourite).

Shoot the floor and get to the other side without causing too much mayhem...

_________________________________________________

- Many thanks go to DragonRock and Mapjunkies.
- Special thanks goes to Archangel for all his help, advice, and wisdom.
- Thanks to [UDEL]Steve for the traffic lights idea.
- Further thanks to Paper-Cut.
- I appreciate all the beta testers who took part in playing the private tests throughout the making of this map.
________________________________________________

INSTALLATION:

- To install the map you will need to copy&paste (or extract the contents of the .rar if you wish) the .BSP file (deathrun_tribute_final.bsp) into the 'maps' folder.
- To get to this folder you will need to go into:
- Program Files>Steam>Steamapps>counter-strike source>cstrike>maps.
- The .bsp file included in the download should go in your maps folder.
- Load up the game and you should be able to play it.
_________________________________________________

If you have any problems or queries about this map then feel free to contact me:

- xfire: targetpractice808
- STEAM Friends: Target Practice

Enjoy the map.

_________________________________________________

NOTE: I trashed the old version due to an error in the map. This is now the complete and final version.

FIX: A button turning green too early was fixed. Updated filename is now deathrun_tribute_final.
